solution_line_template: In a month, she earns {work_days_per_month} x ${daily_earnings} = $<<{work_days_per_month}*{daily_earnings}={monthly_earnings}>>{monthly_earnings}.
Therefore, Ursula's annual salary is {months_per_year} x ${monthly_earnings} = $<<{months_per_year}*{monthly_earnings}={annual_salary}>>{annual_salary}
